morphInfos.tenseExplained: it has happened in the past
morphInfos.voiceExplained: it is something one does oneself or is done to one
morphInfos.numberExplained: there is only one of them
morphInfos.genderExplained: they are female or take a feminine form
morphInfos.description: a woman that _was done_ good _(by himself?)_
morphInfos.explanation: an action that was done to (and by?) a female person or thing that is doing something
